solution_line_template: First find the time Matt spends cleaning the inside of his car: {outside_wash_time} minutes / {inside_time_divisor} = <<{outside_wash_time}/{inside_time_divisor}={inside_wash_time}>>{inside_wash_time} minutes

Then add that time to the time he spends cleaning the outside to find his total cleaning time: {inside_wash_time} minutes + {outside_wash_time} minutes = <<{inside_wash_time}+{outside_wash_time}={total_cleaning_time}>>{total_cleaning_time} minutes
